queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_cached_transactions` ( `transaction_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `session_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `result` text, `site_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`transaction_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_categories` ( `category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `site_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `level` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `leaf` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `id_path` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `full_name` text, `features` text, `feature_update_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`category_id`,`site_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_shippings` ( `service_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `site_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `service_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `is_international` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `category` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ship_days_max` smallint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ship_days_min` smallint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `package` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `carrier` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `weight_required` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `selling_flow` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `dimensions_required` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `surcharge_applicable` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `expedited_service` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `detail_version` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `update_timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`service_id`,`site_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_sites` ( `site_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `site` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `details` text, `detail_update_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`site_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_templates` ( `template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', `site_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `use_as_default` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `root_category` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `category` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `root_sec_category` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `sec_category` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `ebay_duration` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `payment_methods` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `paypal_email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `condition_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `dispatch_days` smallint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `shipping_type` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'C', `shippings` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `international_shippings` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `company_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `free_shipping` varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y', `shipping_cost` double DEFAULT '0', `shipping_cost_additional` double DEFAULT '0', `international_shipping_cost` double DEFAULT '0', `international_shipping_cost_additional` double DEFAULT '0', `international_shipping_locations` text, `return_policy` varchar(255), `contact_time` varchar(255), `refund_method` varchar(255), `cost_paid_by` varchar(255), `return_policy_descr` text, `identifiers` text, PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_template_products` ( `ebay_item_id` bigint(12) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `product_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `product_hash` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `pictures` TEXT, `combinations` BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`,`product_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_product_log` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `product_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `template_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `message` TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `code` varchar(32), `action` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `datetime` int(11), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `template_id` (`template_id`), KEY `product_id` (`product_id`), KEY `type` (`type`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ebay_transaction_log` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `status` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `error_count` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `warning_count` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `success_rate` FLOAT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `start_datetime` int(11), `end_datetime` int(11), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `request` (`request`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
ALTER TABLE `?:products` ADD `ebay_template_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', ADD `product_hash` varchar(255) not null default '';
ALTER TABLE `?:products` ADD COLUMN `ebay_override_price` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N';
ALTER TABLE `?:orders` ADD `ebay_order_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `?:ult_product_descriptions` ADD `ebay_title` varchar(255), ADD `ebay_description` TEXT, ADD `override` varchar(1);
